application.resources

Class mainMenuController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.resources.mainMenuController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class mainMenuController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class is responsible for all operations available in the main menu. This is the first page a palyer sees when they open the game.

        public void newGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        event - Start New Game button clicked.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - This method will take the user to the newGame page where they can make a user account.

      • loadGame

        public void loadGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        event - Load Game button clicked.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - This method will take the user to the login page where they can log in with their user account.

      • tutorial

        public void tutorial(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        event - Tutorial button clicked.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - This method will take the user to the tutorial page where they can learn how to play the game.

      • highScores

        public void highScores(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        event - Highscores button clicked.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - This method will take the user to the global high scores page where they can view all highscores across all classes.

      • quit

        public void quit(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Parameters:
        event - Quit button clicked. This method will close the game window.

      • developerLogin

                    throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        event - Illuminated lightbulb button clicked.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - This method is responsible for a hidden function in the main menu that takes a user to the developer login page.
